definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Odysseus immediately made a semi-circle with his plough to avoid injuring his son.
sentences.chinese: 奧德賽立刻將他的犁轉半圈，以避免傷害他的兒子。

sentences.english: The Odyssey is full of lying, trickery, class betrayal.
sentences.chinese: 《奧德賽》充滿着謊言，詭計，和階級背叛。

sentences.english: Odyssey was soon able to positively identify the wreck as that of the HMS Victory.
sentences.chinese: 奧德賽很快就斷定這就是勝利號的殘骸的一部分。

sentences.english: Crice metamorphosed the companions of Odysseus into swine.
sentences.chinese: 塞西把奧德賽的幾個同伴都變成了豬。

sentences.english: Odyssey has declined to state whether it has found any of the Portuguese bullion.
sentences.chinese: 奧德賽公司拒絕說明它是否已經發現了葡萄牙黃金。

sentences.english: Travel in Luxury Trains Palace on Wheels, Deccan Odyssey, Golden Chariot.
sentences.chinese: 在豪華旅遊列車的車輪宮，德干奧德賽，黃金戰車。

definition: range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)

pinyin: Fa3 lan2 ke4 fu2 Che1 zhan3

definition: Yamaguchi prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 zhou1
